name: Kevin (DOESNT) Go To Heaven
description:
Controls-

WASD to Move
H to Punch

Kevin (doesn't) Go To Heaven is a short top down game where your goal is to avoid going to heaven at all costs-- Old person smell, holier-than-thou Christians, and all the goody-two-shoes in the world does NOT sound like your "perfect afterlife", and you figure the easiest way to stay out of heaven is to commit the worst sin of all-- MURDER. But you aren't a monster, you don't actually want to kill people, so your goal is to run around butchering household objects instead... while avoiding anything that looks dangerous!
